Reasons why an uneducated ordinary perso: This body made up of the four primary elements is seen to accumulate and disperse, to be taken up and laid to rest.
This body made up of the four primary elements is seen to last for a year, or for two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, or a hundred years, or even longer.
Why an uneducated ordinary person is una: For a long time, they’ve been attached to it
They thought of it as their own
They have mistaken it: ‘This is mine, I am this, this is my self.’
The process of dependent origination (a: When this exists, that is; due to the arising of this, that arises.
When this doesn’t exist, that is not; due to the cessation of this, that ceases.
Pleasant feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant. With the cessation of that contact to be experienced as pleasant, the corresponding pleasant feeling ceases and stops.
Painful feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful. With the cessation of that contact to be experienced as painful, the corresponding painful feeling ceases and stops.
Neutral feeling arises dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral. With the cessation of that contact to be experienced as neutral, the corresponding neutral feeling ceases and stops.
The process of disillusionment and freed: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
When desire fades away they’re freed.
When they’re freed, they know they’re freed.
